text:
Speaking of which... Today is the start of the
advertisement display, right?

Luca shot a commercial a while ago. It seems like it's
going to be aired on the city's street vision displays and such.

Well, despite having done various jobs,
seeing yourself on a big screen like that is still exciting.

You're not gonna go... There's no way...
That's not something you'd do...

Wow...! It's really big...!
So cool~!

Haruki-chan, let's take a picture together
with Luca-chan's advertisement.
